column2: "M'akoma popo wɔ iyi ho
"Hom ntsie ne ndze ne dede
column3: Na ndze a ofi n'anomu fir no."

column2: "Ɔnoara na ogyaa mu wɔ sor nyina ase
"N'ekyir no na ndze bi bobɔ mu; Ɔdze no tumdzi ndze no tow asenaman: Na sɛ wɔtse ne ndze a
"Nyankopɔn dze ne ndze tow asenaman nwanwa mu; Ndzɛmba akɛseakɛse na ɔyɛ a yenntum nntse ase."
"Na ɔse esukwankyɛba dɛ
column3: Tɔ asaase do; Nyankom so no nsutɔree
column4: Na n'ahoɔdzen nsu akɛse no so dɛmara."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔsɔɔw nyimpa biara ne nsaano: Ama nyimpa a ɔayɛ hɔn no nyinara eehu."
"Nna mbowadoma kɔ hɔn sumabew
"Pomu afamu pia no mu na ehum ba: Na awɔw so fi kwaamu afamu."
"Ɔnam Nyankopɔn n'ehuhuw do na wɔdze nsubo ma; Na nsu no ne tɛtɛr no ada."
"Nyew
column3: fɔɔfɔɔ ara na ɔdze soa mununkum kebii no
column4: Ɔtsɛw n'enyinam mununkum no mu tɛtɛr:"

column2: "Na ɔnam no kwankyerɛ do dandan bɔ aprɔw
column3: Wɔ wiadze nyina na asaase enyi Ama wɔaayɛ biribiara a ɔhyɛ hɔn:"

column2: "Sɛ ɔdze ma nkyerɛkyerɛ o
"Job
column4: na dwen Nyankopɔn n'anwanwa dwuma ho."

column2: "Ana ɔwo inyim mbrɛ Nyankopɔn dze ne mbra soa hɔn
column3: Na ɔma no mununkum mu enyinam hyerɛn?"

column2: "Ana ɔwo inyim mununkum nkerii
column3: Nyia odzi mu wɔ nyimdzee mu no n'anwanwa dwuma no?"

column2: "Mbrɛ wo ntar mu si yɛ hyew
column3: Aber a osian pomu afamu mframa ntsi

column2: "Ana ɔwo ibotum enye no atsɛw wimu a Ɔyɛ dzen dɛ ahwehwɛ a woegu?"
"Kyerɛ hɛn dza yɛnka nkyerɛ no; Na osian sum ntsi yerunntum nnhyehyɛ hɛn kasaa."
"Ana wɔnka nkyerɛ no dɛ merepɛ maakasa? Anaa nyimpa bi pɛ dɛ wɔmen no?"
"Na afei nyimpa nntum nnhwɛ kan aber a ɔayɛ hyɛnn wɔ wimu no: Aber a mframa etwa mu
"Kwaamu afamu na sika senasena fi ba: Nyankopɔn wɔ tumdzi a ɔyɛ hu wɔ no do."
"Otumfo no ho dze
column3: yerunntum nnhu no; ɔyɛ abɔso wɔ tum mu: Na ɔrenntseetsee wɔ atsɛmbu na pɛrpɛr dodow mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi nyimpa suro no: Osiandɛ ommbu hɔn a wɔyɛ akoma mu enyansafo bi."
